metadata.title: CVE-2023-41326 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI stands for Gestionnaire Libre de Parc Informatique is a Free Asset andIT Management Software package, that provides ITIL Service Desk features,licenses tracking and software auditing. A logged user from any profile canhijack the Kanban feature to alter any user field, and end-up with stealingits account. Users are advised to upgrade to version 10.0.10. There are noknown workarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
